name: Space Crystals (efu-gamedev)
description:
This is my project for the 2nd course of MSU's Videogame Design and Development Especialization. These are the changes I made:

1. I added 3 different levels (each of them has a different mechanic and environment), this counts as 3 different modifications per se.

2. Added dialogues at the beginning of levels.

3. Completed the Main Menu, modified some enemies stats and appearence, and created new tiles such as auto-kill tiles, and some other minor modifications.

4. 2 of the 3 levels have "bosses".

Diego Faria, 12/03/2022.
